description: Deletes an existing Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels dataset. Deleting a dataset might take while. Use  DescribeDataset to check the current status. The dataset is still deleting if the value of Status is DELETE_IN_PROGRESS. If you try to access the dataset after it is deleted, you get a ResourceNotFoundException exception. You can't delete a dataset while it is creating ( Status = CREATE_IN_PROGRESS) or if the dataset is updating ( Status = UPDATE_IN_PROGRESS). This operation requires permissions to perform the rekognition:DeleteDataset action.

parameters.name: DatasetArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the Amazon Rekognition Custom Labels dataset that you want to delete.
